name: verified-permissions-authorizer
description: Bridged Go component provider that provisions an AWS Verified Permissions Policy Store and a Lambda Authorizer (runtime fixed to nodejs22.x).

verifiedPermissions.description: AVP schema and policy ingestion settings. The component will load a schema (YAML/JSON), validate and convert it to JSON, enforce single namespace, validate canonical PascalCase action groups (including Global* variants), apply the schema if changed, create static policies from the policyDir, and (when guardrails are enabled) install baseline deny guardrails. Optionally validates a canary file.

actionGroupEnforcement.description: Enforce canonical PascalCase action groups: Create/Delete/Find/Get/Update plus Batch* variants and Global* equivalents.

canaryFile.description: Optional YAML file with canary cases. When provided, canaries are executed post-deploy. Path is resolved relative to the Pulumi project root when not absolute.

disableGuardrails.description: Disable installing provider-managed guardrail deny policies. Not recommended; a warning is emitted when true.

schemaFile.description: Path to schema file (YAML or JSON). YAML is always converted to canonical JSON before validation.

cognito.description: Provision an AWS Cognito User Pool and configure it as the Verified Permissions identity source.

sesConfig.description: Optional: configure the User Pool to send email via Amazon SES (DEVELOPER). When provided, the pool's EmailConfiguration is set accordingly and a resource policy is attached to the SES identity authorizing the Cognito service principal scoped to this User Pool.

from.description: From address. Must match the SES email identity or be within the SES domain identity.

sourceArn.description: SES identity ARN to send from. Example: arn:aws:ses:us-east-1:123456789012:identity/example.com

signInAliases.description: Allowed sign-in identifiers for the User Pool.

enableDynamoDbStream.description: If true, enable DynamoDB Streams (NEW_AND_OLD_IMAGES) on the auth table

lambda.description: Settings for the bundled Lambda authorizer.

memorySize.description: Memory size for the Lambda function in MB.

provisionedConcurrency.description: Provisioned concurrency units for the Lambda function (0 disables).

reservedConcurrency.description: Reserved concurrency limit for the Lambda function.

retainOnDelete.description: When true, resources are retained on delete and protected from deletion where supported (e.g., Cognito User Pool deletion protection).

cognito.description: Cognito-related outputs for the provisioned identity source (when configured).

authTableArn.description: ARN of the DynamoDB auth table

authTableStreamArn.description: ARN of the DynamoDB auth table stream (when streams are enabled)
